title.en: Words to Delight the Lake-Born One

text.en: Namo guru padmākarāya!
text.en-trans: namo guru pemakaraya

text.en: The actual embodiment of all the victorious ones of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa tamché düpé ngö

text.en: Whose qualities of knowledge, love and power are as vast as space,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé yönten kha dang nyam

text.en: Teacher to all who soar and roam about, Ācārya Padmasambhava—
text.en-trans: pur drö lobpön pema jungné kyi

text.en: Grant auspiciousness, so your tradition may flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: ringluk dar zhing gyepé shipa tsol

text.en: You are the equal of the buddhas in your realized intent,
text.en-trans: khyé ni sangye nam dang gongpa chik

text.en: A master from whom oceanic maṇḍalas of yidam deities emanate and into whom they are reabsorbed.
text.en-trans: yidam kyilkhor gyatso trodü dak

text.en: A brother to all ḍākinīs, sovereign of all vīras,
text.en-trans: khandro yong kyi mingpo pawo gyal

text.en: Vajra Skull-Garland, a great treasury of blessings,
text.en-trans: dorjé tötreng jinlab terdzö ché

text.en: Comparable to the sun and moon, a wish-fulfilling jewel or wish-granting tree,
text.en-trans: nyida norbu paksam shing zhindu

text.en: A source of supreme and ordinary attainments, a treasure of benefit and happiness,
text.en-trans: choktün ngödrub jungné pendé yik

text.en: An adornment for the crowns of all the beings of the three worlds—
text.en-trans: si sum drowa kün gyi tsuk gi gyen

text.en: May your tradition shine as resplendently as the sun.
text.en-trans: gang gi ringluk nyi tar sal gyur chik

text.en: In this benighted country of the red-faced people, Tibet,
text.en-trans: dong mar böyul münpé ling nyi du

text.en: You bound gods and spirits under oath and introduced the chariot of the teachings.
text.en-trans: lhasin dam tak tenpé shingta dren

text.en: Abbot, teacher and dharma-king, Vairotsana, Kawa Paltsek and Chokro Lüi Gyaltsen,
text.en-trans: khen lob chögyal bai ro ka chok gang

text.en: And hosts of learned and accomplished vidyādharas who had gained attainments,
text.en-trans: drub nyé khedrub rigdzin tsok nam kyi

text.en: All with enlightened resolve, painstakingly sought, translated and taught,
text.en-trans: tukkyé kawé tsal zhing gyur shé dang

text.en: Establishing the validity, through study and through practice,
text.en-trans: chenyen gom drub tsemé drubpa yi

text.en: Of the precious teachings of the Vinaya, Sūtra, Abhidharma,
text.en-trans: dul do ngönpa sang ngak chinang gi

text.en: And the outer and inner collections of Secret Mantra—may they flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen dar zhing gyé gyur chik

text.en: Even across many aeons, it is rare to hear the names of
text.en-trans: khyepar kal mang tsen tsam tö kawé

text.en: The great tantras of the inner yogic methods, in particular—
text.en-trans: nangpa naljor tab kyi gyü chenpö

text.en: The Essence of Illusory Display, the Sūtra of Gathering, and Area of the Mind.1
text.en-trans: nyingpo gyutrul dü do sem chok kyi

text.en: Seeing the extremely fragile state of the transmission lineages
text.en-trans: gyü shé wang kadampé mengak nam

text.en: Of their explanation, empowerment and pith instructions,
text.en-trans: shintu nyak trar gyurpa dir zik né

text.en: Intensify the power of your wisdom, compassion and skill,
text.en-trans: khyen tob tukjé nüpé tsal truk té

text.en: And cause vidyādharas and sublime nirmāṇakāya emanations
text.en-trans: rigdzin trulpé ku chok khyepar chen

text.en: To appear, just like bolts of lightning descending from the sky.
text.en-trans: kha lé tok bab zhindu jönpar dzö

text.en: With the wisdom of the warrior Mañjuśrī in our hearts,
text.en-trans: jampal pawö yeshe nying la zhuk

text.en: The tender loving gaze of Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: chenrezik kyi tsewé chen dangden

text.en: And the strength and capacity of the mighty Keeper of Secrets,2
text.en-trans: sang dzin wangpö nüpé tu nyepé

text.en: May we rekindle the dying embers of the Ancient Translation teachings.
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpé mé ro long gyur chik

text.en: May the ranks of the ordained saṅgha who possess renunciation and discipline
text.en-trans: ngejung tsultrim denpé tsünpa dang

text.en: And of the secret mantra practitioners who maintain the samayas of the two stages
text.en-trans: rim nyi damden sang ngakchang ba yi

text.en: Both expand like the great lake of Manasarovar.
text.en-trans: dé nyi ma drö tso chen tar gyé té

text.en: The outer sciences of refutation and maintenance,
text.en-trans: tsarchö jedzin chi yi rigpé né

text.en: The great textual tradition of the profound inner science,
text.en-trans: zabmo nang gi dön rik zhungluk ché

text.en: And scripture and reasoning based on threefold analysis
text.en-trans: jangchok shé gyün dekpé ka chen chü

text.en: From the ten great pillars who supported the exegetical tradition in this northern land—
text.en-trans: ché sum dakpé lung rik chö nga drok

text.en: May the drum of Dharma resound and the four river-like transmissions flourish.
text.en-trans: kabab chuwo nam zhi gyé gyur chik

text.en: May the jewel-like material and Dharma treasures
text.en-trans: shintu zabpa kün dang tünmong min

text.en: Of the great vidyādharas with miraculous powers,
text.en-trans: khandrö nyingtrak ter gyi gyü dzinpé

text.en: Who appeared in the past and who will come in future,
text.en-trans: dzutrul tsal chang rigdzin chenpo nam

text.en: Upholding the lineage of extremely profound, uncommon treasures,
text.en-trans: ngar yang jön dang lé né jön gyur gyi

text.en: The ḍākinīs’ heart-blood, be widely disseminated,
text.en-trans: dzé dang chö ter norbü dram bur dal

text.en: Dispelling all the ills that plague the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: ten drö güpa tamché selwa dang

text.en: May those who attain supreme and common siddhis fill the earth,
text.en-trans: choktün ngödrub nyepé sateng kheng

text.en: And may the teachings of the Mahāguru spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: maha gurü tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: By transcending the limited tenets of the eight speculative vehicles,
text.en-trans: yichö tekpé drubté trang lé gal

text.en: As mental knots are released, may the realization of three-kāya awareness
text.en-trans: sem kyi dü drol rigpa ku sum gyi

text.en: Reach full strength and all dharmas be freed in their own place.
text.en-trans: gongpé tsal dzok chö kün rang sar drol

text.en: Then, through the direct approach of the four lamps of luminosity,
text.en-trans: ösal drönma zhi yi seng lam né

text.en: In the vast dharmakāya expanse of primordially pure great emptiness,
text.en-trans: kadak tongchen chökü longchen por

text.en: May the spontaneously perfect clusters of kāyas and wisdoms appear clearly,
text.en-trans: lhündrub ku dang yeshe tsombu tra

text.en: And may we reach the culmination of the path of the four visions.
text.en-trans: nangwa zhi yi lam gyi patar chin

text.en: Through gaining the vajrakāya that is the maturation of awareness,
text.en-trans: rigpa chü min dorjé ku nyepé

text.en: May our impact extend throughout every valley in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangchen ri yi sul künkhyab pa dang

text.en: And with the roaring laughter of vajra fearlessness,
text.en-trans: jikme dorjé gegyang drokpa yi

text.en: May we triumph over all the savage beasts who are our adversaries.
text.en-trans: pé gol chenzen tumpo tadak chom

text.en: May the teachings of the Lake-born Buddha flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: May the great waves of the four types of activity
text.en-trans: mengak gyatsö chuter chenpo lé

text.en: Emerge out of the vast, oceanic treasury of pith instructions,
text.en-trans: trinlé nam zhi ba lab cher yöpé

text.en: Causing the teachings of the Omniscient Sage to flourish and spread,
text.en-trans: künkhyen tubpé tenpa pel zhing gyé

text.en: And may the happiness of beings throughout the whole of space forever increase.
text.en-trans: khakhyab semchen dekyi gyé gyur chik

text.en: Encouraged by the glories of the Ancient Translations school,
text.en-trans: ngagyur shingté pal lé drangpa yi

text.en: May those who uphold the teaching and practice of the Kadam, Sakya,
text.en-trans: kadam sakya mar shang kagyü dang

text.en: Marpa and Shangpa Kagyü, Gendenpa, Pacifying, Chöd, Jonang, Zhalu
text.en-trans: geden zhi chö jo zhal lasokpa

text.en: And other traditions help their own systems to flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: shedrub dzin nam tenpa dargyé shok

text.en: In short, through the enlightened resolve of the kings, ministers,
text.en-trans: dorna ngön jön gyal lön changsem dang

text.en: Bodhisattvas and emanated lotsāwas and paṇḍitas of the past,
text.en-trans: trulpé lo pen nam kyi tukkyé kyi

text.en: May all that we be accomplished in accordance with our wishes,
text.en-trans: jitar mönpa zhindu drubpa dang

text.en: And may the teachings of the Oḍḍiyāna Guru flourish and spread.
text.en-trans: orgyen gurü tenpa dargyé shok

text.en: Moreover, may all be auspicious for the nonsectarian teachings to spread,
text.en-trans: zhenyang rimé tenpa dar zhing gyé

text.en: The lives of the sublime beings who uphold the teachings to remain secure,
text.en-trans: tendzin kyechok zhabpé tenpa dang

text.en: The saṅgha to live in harmony, the merit and longevity of patrons to increase,
text.en-trans: gendün tuktün jindak tsesö gyé

text.en: All the various ills of this age without exception to be pacified,
text.en-trans: dü kyi güpa malü kün zhi zhing

text.en: The fresh sun heralding a golden dawn to rise within the sky,
text.en-trans: kha la dzokden sarpé nyizhön char

text.en: Lotus gardens of wonder to flourish everywhere upon the earth,
text.en-trans: sa la ngotsar pemé gatsal gyé

text.en: The atmosphere to be enriched by splendours of virtuous excellence,
text.en-trans: bardu gelek pal gyi jorpa yi

text.en: And the teachings never to decline but to flourish and spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: tenpa mi nub dargyé tashi shok
